quotes.quote: Life isn’t about getting and having, it’s about giving and being.
quotes.author: Kevin Kruse

quotes.quote: Whatever the mind of man can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Two roads diverged in a wood, and I—I took the one less traveled by, And that has made all the difference.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.
quotes.author: Florence Nightingale

quotes.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.quote: The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.quote: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.quote: Definiteness of purpose is the starting point of all achievement.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.quote: We must balance conspicuous consumption with conscious capitalism.
quotes.author: Kevin Kruse

quotes.quote: Life is what happens to you while you’re busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: We become what we think about.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: Life is 10% what happens to me and 90% of how I react to it.
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.quote: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don’t have any.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: An unexamined life is not worth living.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Eighty percent of success is showing up.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Your time is limited, so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Winning isn’t everything, but wanting to win is.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Every child is an artist.  The problem is how to remain an artist once he grows up.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: You can never cross the ocean until you have the courage to lose sight of the shore.
quotes.author: Christopher Columbus

quotes.quote: Either you run the day, or the day runs you.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Whether you think you can or you think you can’t, you’re right.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Whatever you can do, or dream you can, begin it.  Boldness has genius, power and magic in it.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: The best revenge is massive success.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: People often say that motivation doesn’t last. Well, neither does bathing.  That’s why we recommend it daily.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one’s courage.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: If you hear a voice within you say “you cannot paint,” then by all means paint and that voice will be silenced.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: There is only one way to avoid criticism: do nothing, say nothing, and be nothing.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Ask and it will be given to you; search, and you will find; knock and the door will be opened for you.
quotes.author: Jesus

quotes.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams.  Live the life you have imagined.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Few things can help an individual more than to place responsibility on him, and to let him know that you trust him.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.quote: Certain things catch your eye, but pursue only those that capture the heart.
quotes.author: Ancient Indian Proverb

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
quotes.author: George Addair

quotes.quote: Teach thy tongue to say, “I do not know,” and thous shalt progress.
quotes.author: Maimonides

quotes.quote: Start where you are. Use what you have.  Do what you can.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.quote: Fall seven times and stand up eight.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: Everything has beauty, but not everyone can see.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Life is not measured by the number of breaths we take, but by the moments that take our breath away.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Happiness is not something readymade.  It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: If you’re offered a seat on a rocket ship, don’t ask what seat! Just get on.
quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg

quotes.quote: If the wind will not serve, take to the oars.
quotes.author: Latin Proverb

quotes.quote: You can’t fall if you don’t climb.  But there’s no joy in living your whole life on the ground.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
quotes.author: Joshua J. Marine

quotes.quote: If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.quote: Limitations live only in our minds.  But if we use our imaginations, our possibilities become limitless.
quotes.author: Jamie Paolinetti

quotes.quote: You take your life in your own hands, and what happens? A terrible thing, no one to blame.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: I didn’t fail the test. I just found 100 ways to do it wrong.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: In order to succeed, your desire for success should be greater than your fear of failure.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The person who says it cannot be done should not interrupt the person who is doing it.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: There are no traffic jams along the extra mile.
quotes.author: Roger Staubach

quotes.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: You become what you believe.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: I would rather die of passion than of boredom.
quotes.author: Vincent van Gogh

quotes.quote: A truly rich man is one whose children run into his arms when his hands are empty.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Build your own dreams, or someone else will hire you to build theirs.
quotes.author: Farrah Gray

quotes.quote: Education costs money.  But then so does ignorance.
quotes.author: Sir Claus Moser

quotes.quote: I have learned over the years that when one’s mind is made up, this diminishes fear.
quotes.author: Rosa Parks

quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Remember that not getting what you want is sometimes a wonderful stroke of luck.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: You can’t use up creativity.  The more you use, the more you have.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Dream big and dare to fail.
quotes.author: Norman Vaughan

quotes.quote: Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Do what you can, where you are, with what you have.
quotes.author: Teddy Roosevelt

quotes.quote: If you do what you’ve always done, you’ll get what you’ve always gotten.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Dreaming, after all, is a form of planning.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: You may be disappointed if you fail, but you are doomed if you don’t try.
quotes.author: Beverly Sills

quotes.quote: Remember no one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Life is what we make it, always has been, always will be.
quotes.author: Grandma Moses

quotes.quote: The question isn’t who is going to let me; it’s who is going to stop me.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: It’s not the years in your life that count. It’s the life in your years.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Either write something worth reading or do something worth writing.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says, “I’m possible!”
quotes.author: –Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: If you can dream it, you can achieve it.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: A short saying often contains much wisdom.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Yesterday I dared to struggle. Today I dare to win.
quotes.author: Bernadette Devlin

quotes.quote: Victory belongs to the most persevering.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: No alibi will save you from accepting the responsibility.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: From error to error one discovers the entire truth.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: It is better to travel well than to arrive.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: You have to believe in yourself.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: Our intention creates our reality.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Silence is a true friend who never betrays.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Character develops itself in the stream of life.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: From little acorns mighty oaks do grow.
quotes.author: American proverb

quotes.quote: You have to believe in yourself.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: You can't stop the waves, but you can learn to surf.
quotes.author: Jon Kabat-Zinn

quotes.quote: Reality does not conform to the ideal, but confirms it.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote: Speak low, if you speak love.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: A really great talent finds its happiness in execution.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Reality leaves a lot to the imagination.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Our intention creates our reality.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Society develops wit, but its contemplation alone forms genius.
quotes.author: Madame de Stael

quotes.quote: The greatest remedy for anger is delay.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Growth itself contains the germ of happiness.
quotes.author: Pearl Buck

quotes.quote: We choose our destiny in the way we treat others.
quotes.author: Wit

quotes.quote: Time is the most valuable thing a man can spend.
quotes.author: Theophrastus

quotes.quote: No snowflake in an avalanche ever feels responsible.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Smile, breathe, and go slowly.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Fortune favours the brave.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.quote: I believe in one thing only, the power of human will.
quotes.author: Joseph Stalin

quotes.quote: The more you know yourself, the more you forgive yourself.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The best way out is always through.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: The mind unlearns with difficulty what it has long learned.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: I destroy my enemies when I make them my friends.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: No garden is without its weeds.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: There is no failure except in no longer trying.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Kind words will unlock an iron door.
quotes.author: Turkish proverb

quotes.quote: Problems are only opportunities with thorns on them.
quotes.author: Hugh Miller

quotes.quote: Life is just a chance to grow a soul.
quotes.author: A. Powell Davies

quotes.quote: Reality does not conform to the ideal, but confirms it.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Mountains cannot be surmounted except by winding paths.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: May our hearts garden of awakening bloom with hundreds of flowers.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Nobody will believe in you unless you believe in yourself.
quotes.author: Liberace

quotes.quote: Fortune befriends the bold.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: Keep true to the dreams of thy youth.
quotes.author: Friedrich von Schiller

quotes.quote: You're never a loser until you quit trying.
quotes.author: Mike Ditka

quotes.quote: Science is organized knowledge. Wisdom is organized life.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: Knowing is not enough; we must apply!
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Strong beliefs win strong men, and then make them stronger.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Autumn is a second spring when every leaf is a flower.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: If you surrender to the wind, you can ride it.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.quote: Character develops itself in the stream of life.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: We must become the change we want to see.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Keep yourself to the sunshine and you cannot see the shadow.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Write your plans in pencil and give God the eraser.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Inspiration exists, but it has to find us working.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: All serious daring starts from within.
quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.quote: Pick battles big enough to matter, small enough to win.
quotes.author: Jonathan Kozol

quotes.quote: Don't compromise yourself. You are all you've got.
quotes.author: Janis Joplin

quotes.quote: He that is giddy thinks the world turns round.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: A short saying oft contains much wisdom.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Difficulties are things that show a person what they are.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: When you doubt your power, you give power to your doubt.
quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

quotes.quote: The cause is hidden. The effect is visible to all.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: A weed is no more than a flower in disguise.
quotes.author: James Lowell

quotes.quote: Keep true to the dreams of thy youth.
quotes.author: Friedrich von Schiller

quotes.quote: A prudent question is one half of wisdom.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: The path to success is to take massive, determined action.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: I allow my intuition to lead my path.
quotes.author: Manuel Puig

quotes.quote: Nature takes away any faculty that is not used.
quotes.author: William R. Inge

quotes.quote: All our knowledge has its origins in our perceptions.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: If the shoe doesn't fit, must we change the foot?
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: May our hearts garden of awakening bloom with hundreds of flowers.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: If you wish to be a writer, write.
quotes.author: Epictetus
